\documentclass[a4paper,12pt]{article}

\usepackage[a4paper,margin=0mm]{geometry}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{eso-pic}

% ------------------------
% Load system fonts (installed via Docker + fontconfig)
% ------------------------
\setmainfont{Raleway}
\newfontfamily\merri{Merriweather}

% ------------------------
% Inject cover fields generated by Node (written at runtime)
% ------------------------
\input{cover-data.tex}

% ------------------------
% No page numbers
% ------------------------
\pagestyle{empty}

% ------------------------
% Background image (top ~175mm)
% Uses \CoverImagePath written by Node.
% Never crops: keepaspectratio.
% ------------------------
\newcommand\BackgroundPic{
  \put(0,0){
    \parbox[b][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{
      \centering
      \IfFileExists{\CoverImagePath}{
        \includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=175mm,keepaspectratio]{\CoverImagePath}
      }{
        \rule{\paperwidth}{175mm}
      }
      \vfill
    }
  }
}

\begin{document}

% Background image
\AddToShipoutPicture*{\BackgroundPic}

% ------------------------
% Absolute positioned text block
% ------------------------
\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]

% Main Title
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-190mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{32}{36}\selectfont \textbf{\MainTitle}};

% Subheadline 1 (e.g. Confidential)
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-205mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{14}{18}\selectfont \ConfidentialLine};

% Subheadline 2 (e.g. Finance Memorandum)
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-218mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{14}{18}\selectfont \DocumentType};

% Headline (e.g. Construction Finance)
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-235mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{22}{26}\selectfont \textbf{\Headline}};

% Project Name
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-255mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{18}{22}\selectfont \ProjectName};

% Loan Amount
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-270mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{16}{20}\selectfont \LoanAmount};

% Date
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-285mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{14}{18}\selectfont \DateLine};

% Reference Number
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-298mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont \RefNumber};

% Company Details line
\node[anchor=west] at ([xshift=20mm,yshift=-312mm]current page.north west)
{\merri\fontsize{11}{14}\selectfont \CompanyLine};

\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
